db7d0219c7651d3559a19563addece6b757ae690;Tony Curtis;Tony Curtis;arcurtis@mail.uh.edu;arcurtis@mail.uh.edu;2:1;1341188560;1341188560;src/collect/collect-linear.c;Looks like I read a barrier into collectives that actually isn't there. Reductions (for example) only guarantee the *local* data is stored, so these changes address that with a quiet instead.  This addresses the Mellanox feedback on the test-suite about not having synch. or alternating Sync arrays between successive collectives with the same active set.
